title: The Merry mishaps of Mr. Bean
brief_description: Two more episodes in the adventures of the socially inept Mr. Bean. “Merry Christmas Mr. Bean” gives real meaning to the saying that Christmas shopping is a nightmare. In “Mr. Bean in room 426” the great rubber-faced one makes himself at home in a hotel room and is caught with his pants down (literally!). Watch for a cameo appearance by Danny La Rue and hear the great impersonator speak as you have never heard him before.
